page.title: 14HOBBIES
page.content: Most of us have hobbies,some go to B.B.- the Boys Brigade and some like to collect things.I go to the B.B. on Tuesdays and Thursdays.I play games such as snooker,table tennis,darts, chess and draughts.On Mondays and Wednesdays I go to the London Gym Team which performed on the South Bank by the Thames on July 3rd and have been at the Albert Hall.On a Friday I go to the London Band who teach you new marches.I have to play the drums,bugle,and glockenspiel and I'm allowed to enter many competitions.The band went to the Albert Hall and played at the Royal Tournament on 22nd July.Some other people collect and swap stickers and then stick them into scrap books. People also enjoy reading.One group liked books by Enid Blyton,Noel Streat -field and L.M.Alcott.
